title: How do you interpret spell components?

posts.author: SorcerousSally
posts.content:
I've been thinking about interpret lately and wanted to get everyone's opinions.

Quick question about interpret that came up in our game last night.

I'd love to hear everyone's experiences with interpret and how it's worked in your games.

What do you all think? Has anyone else had similar questions about interpret?
posts.thread_title: How do you interpret spell components?

posts.author: WizardlyWisdom
posts.content:
We had a hilarious situation where our Bard tried to use spell to negotiate with a dragon. It went exactly as you'd expect!

In the new 2024 rules update, they changed how spell works. Now it's more streamlined but I'm not sure if it's better overall.

I think the RAW (Rules As Written) for spell are clear, but many DMs seem to interpret it differently.

In my campaign, we had a situation with spell that played out really well. The player used it creatively to overcome a challenge I didn't expect them to solve.
